game.name: what did the chicken see
game.shortDescription: A short, dark visual novel about a broken world. You are trapped with a cynical narrator who questions everything—school, society, and even you. In this glitchy reality, do your choices really matter, or are you just part of the system?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A short, dark visual novel about a broken world. You are trapped with a cynical narrator who questions everything—school, society, and even you. In this glitchy reality, do your choices really matter, or are you just part of the system?
